summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6210 for the improvement of West Barton Street from 23rd Avenue Southwest to 25th Avenue Southwest; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 88473, and levying and assessing the amount thereof against the several lots, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
